mapper.select: SELECT sc.student_course_id, c.course_id, s.student_id, sc.create_time, sc.last_edit_time, c.course_name, s.student_name FROM student_course sc , course c , student s WHERE sc.course_id = c.course_id AND sc.student_id = s.student_id

SELECT sc.student_course_id, c.course_id, s.student_id, sc.create_time, sc.last_edit_time, c.course_name, s.student_name FROM student_course sc , course c , student s WHERE sc.student_course_id = #{studentCourseId} AND sc.course_id = c.course_id AND sc.student_id = s.student_id

SELECT c.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_size, c.course_desc, c.create_time, t.teacher_id, t.teacher_name FROM student_course sc , course c , student s , teacher t WHERE sc.student_id = #{student.studentId} AND sc.course_id = c.course_id AND sc.student_id = s.student_id AND c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id

SELECT s.student_id, s.student_name, s.gender, s.email, s.student_desc, c.clazz_id, c.clazz_desc, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time FROM student_course sc , student s , clazz c WHERE sc.course_id = #{course.courseId} AND sc.student_id = s.student_id AND s.clazz_id = c.clazz_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_course (student_course_id, course_id, student_id, create_time) VALUES (#{studentCourseId},#{course.courseId},#{student.studentId},#{createTime})
